quests.title: Lighting the Sacred Fire
quests.description: Learn the sacred art of kindling Agni, the divine messenger
quests.narrative: In the dawn of time, Agni was born as the bridge between earth and heaven. As you strike the flint, you're not just lighting fire—you're awakening the cosmic force that carries your prayers to the gods.

gameplayElements.description: Arrange the ritual materials in correct order

feedback.correct: Perfect! The fire blazes with divine energy. Agni awakens to carry your intentions.
feedback.incorrect: The fire sputters. Remember: purify first, invoke Agni, then kindle the flame with offerings.

loreContent.translation: O Agni, lead us on the right path to prosperity
loreContent.context: From Isha Upanishad - Agni as the divine guide and purifier

quests.reflection: How does the act of lighting fire connect you to the ancient practitioners who performed this same ritual thousands of years ago?

quests.title: Understanding Dharma in Action
quests.description: Explore how every ritual action carries cosmic significance
quests.narrative: Every gesture in Vedic ritual is a word in the language of the cosmos. The way you hold your hands, the direction you face, the time you choose—all speak to the underlying order of dharma.

gameplayElements.description: Choose the dharmic action in different ritual scenarios

scenarios.situation: During sunset prayers, you realize you're facing west instead of east. What do you do?
choices: Continue facing west, as changing direction mid-prayer is disruptive
Pause, reorient to east, and restart the prayer
Finish the current verse, then turn east
Face north as a compromise direction
scenarios.explanation: Dharmic action requires correction when error is discovered. Restarting with proper orientation honors the cosmic order.

loreContent.translation: Dharma is the foundation of the entire universe
loreContent.context: Understanding that ritual aligns us with cosmic order

quests.reflection: How does understanding dharma change your approach to daily actions beyond ritual?

quests.title: Mantras and Their Meanings
quests.description: Match sacred sounds to their divine purposes and understand the power of pronunciation
quests.narrative: Mantras are not mere words but vibrational keys that unlock cosmic energies. Each syllable carries power, each tone creates resonance with different aspects of reality.

gameplayElements.description: Match each mantra with its correct purpose and timing

loreContent.translation: That which protects through contemplation is a mantra
loreContent.context: The etymological definition of mantra from ancient texts

quests.reflection: How does conscious pronunciation of mantras change their effect compared to mechanical repetition?

quests.title: Sacred Geometry of the Altar
quests.description: Construct the perfect altar using Vedic proportions and cosmic alignments
quests.narrative: The altar is a microcosm of the universe itself. Its proportions mirror cosmic ratios, its orientation aligns with celestial movements. You are building not just a table, but a doorway between worlds.

gameplayElements.description: Build a ritual altar with correct proportions and placements

elements.significance: Sacred fire at the heart of creation
Direction of Agni and divine offerings

loreContent.translation: Where the gods stretch out the divine sacrifice
loreContent.context: The altar as cosmic space from Rigveda

quests.reflection: How does creating sacred space through geometry affect your consciousness during ritual?

quests.title: Timing and Cosmic Rhythms
quests.description: Learn when to perform different rituals based on celestial movements
quests.narrative: Time is not uniform in the Vedic understanding. There are auspicious moments when the veil between dimensions is thin, when cosmic energies flow differently. Learning to read these rhythms is essential for effective ritual.

gameplayElements.description: Schedule rituals at optimal cosmic timings

loreContent.translation: Time is the supreme abode of Brahman
loreContent.context: Time as divine principle in Vedantic thought

quests.reflection: How does awareness of cosmic timing change your relationship with daily routines?

quests.title: The Language of Gesture
quests.description: Master the sacred hand positions that channel different energies
quests.narrative: Your hands are instruments of divine will. Each finger represents an element, each position creates a circuit for specific energies. Ancient sages encoded entire philosophies into these elegant forms.

gameplayElements.description: Perform correct hand gestures for different ritual purposes

loreContent.translation: The hand is the sustainer of the world
loreContent.context: Hands as cosmic instruments in Tantra

quests.reflection: How do conscious hand positions affect your mental and emotional state during practice?

quests.title: Offerings and their Significance
quests.description: Understand the cosmic meaning behind different ritual offerings
quests.narrative: Every offering is a conversation with the universe. Rice represents prosperity, flowers represent beauty, water represents life itself. Learning this language allows you to speak directly with cosmic forces.

gameplayElements.description: Match offerings with their cosmic significance and appropriate timing

loreContent.context: The cosmic nature of offering from Taittiriya Samhita

quests.reflection: How does understanding symbolic meaning change your relationship with material objects?

quests.title: Advanced Ritual Sequences
quests.description: Orchestrate complex ceremonies with multiple components
quests.narrative: You've learned the notes; now it's time to compose the symphony. Complex rituals weave together all elements—fire, water, air, earth, and space—into a harmonious cosmic dance.

gameplayElements.description: Coordinate multiple ritual elements in proper sequence

loreContent.translation: Refinement is the emergence of subtle qualities
loreContent.context: The transformative power of proper ritual sequence

quests.reflection: How does orchestrating complex sequences develop your ability to hold multiple intentions simultaneously?

quests.title: Reading Cosmic Signs
quests.description: Interpret the subtle signs that indicate ritual success or needed adjustments
quests.narrative: The universe is constantly communicating. A flame that flickers in a certain way, the direction of smoke, the calls of birds—all carry messages for those trained to perceive them.

gameplayElements.description: Interpret various cosmic signs and their ritual implications

signs.meaning: Prayers are being carried to the gods

loreContent.context: Everything as divine communication from Chandogya Upanishad

quests.reflection: How does learning to read subtle signs change your awareness in daily life?

quests.title: Personal Ritual Creation
quests.description: Design your own ritual combining all learned elements for a specific intention
quests.narrative: The ultimate test of mastery is creation. Using all you've learned, craft a personal ritual that addresses your unique spiritual needs while honoring ancient wisdom.

gameplayElements.description: Create a complete personal ritual combining learned elements

loreContent.translation: Let there be no neglect of self-study and practice
loreContent.context: Personal practice as spiritual duty from Taittiriya Upanishad

quests.reflection: How does creating your own ritual deepen your understanding of the principles behind traditional practices?

quests.title: Vedic Hermeneutics
quests.description: Learn the advanced art of interpreting Vedic texts and their ritual applications
quests.narrative: The Vedas speak in symbols, metaphors, and multi-layered meanings. Each verse contains practical instructions, philosophical insights, and mystical revelations. Learning to decode these layers is the mark of a true interpreter.

gameplayElements.description: Analyze Vedic verses to extract their ritual, philosophical, and mystical meanings

layers: Literal: I praise Agni, the priest of sacrifice
Mystical: Awakening inner fire of consciousness

loreContent.translation: The gods love what is mysterious/symbolic
loreContent.context: The multilayered nature of sacred language from Shatapatha Brahmana

quests.reflection: How does understanding multiple layers of meaning change your relationship with sacred texts?

quests.title: The Cosmic Sacrifice
quests.description: Understand ritual as participation in the ongoing cosmic sacrifice that sustains reality
quests.narrative: At the deepest level, all ritual is participation in the cosmic yajna—the eternal sacrifice by which the universe maintains itself. Every action becomes sacred when performed with this understanding.

gameplayElements.description: Integrate all learned elements into understanding of cosmic sacrifice
concepts: Consciousness as both priest and sacrifice

loreContent.translation: Sacrifice is indeed the life of all beings
loreContent.context: The cosmic sacrifice as universal principle from Mahabharata

quests.reflection: How does seeing all existence as cosmic sacrifice transform your understanding of your role in the universe?
